title: As a User, I want the Safe Harbor language on the Assignment Agreement updated
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in

Related to: #165827688
custom_steps: WHEN an Outright Trade has the Safe Harbor Election checkbox checked
custom_expected:
THEN the Assignment Agreement will contain the following paragraph:
  -- â€œEach assignor Club and each assignee Club hereby agree to treat the assignment of each of the contracts and draft picks listed above consistent with Section 4 of Revenue Procedure 2019-18 issued by the Internal Revenue Service on April 11, 2019 to the extent each such Club is subject to Federal income tax in the United States.â€￾

title: As an Inquiring Club User, I want to Create a New Employee Permission Req. Form
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in as a Club User

Wire:
https://hri2kq.axshare.com/#p=request_form_-_inquiring_org_-_preliminary

Data Discovery:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Data+Discovery+-+Employee+Permission+Request+Form+-+Inquiring+Club
custom_steps: WHEN there will be a Create New Request button on the Employee Permission Requests widget
custom_expected:
THEN clicking the button will open a new Employee Permission request in Edit Mode
AND the request will match the provided wire and data discovery

title: Update MNC Closed Period Rule
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the Closed Period currently ends

Rule 5.12:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/5.+Minor+Contract+-+onSubmit

Related to: #166363225.
custom_expected:
THEN Rule should be updated so the Close Period ends with the conclusion of the Rule 4 Draft
AND If player has any R4 status other than "Drafted", signing date must not be on or withing Rule 4 Signing Closed Period Start (Set in system dates) 
AND completion of Rule 4 Draft (set in System dates)
AND Only applies to players in the most recent draft, otherwise show hard error for club and overrideable error for BOC

title: As a User, I want to be warned when Adding a Disqualified player to a trade
custom_preconds: GIVEN a User attempts to add a Disqualified Player to a trade
custom_steps: WHEN the Safe Harbor box is checked
custom_expected:
THEN a blocking message will fire: 
  -- **Body:** Warning: This player is a Disqualified Player.  Safe Harbor cannot be elected if any Disqualified Player Contracts are included.
  -- **Buttons:** Ok
AND When the user clicks OK, the message will be dismissed and the player will appear on the trade
BUT If the Safe Harbor box is not checked when a Disqualified Player is added, the message will not fire.

title: As an Inquiring Club User, I want to Save an Employee Permission Req. Form
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in as a Inquiring Club User, a save button will be available anytime the form is in edit mode

Wire:
https://hri2kq.axshare.com/#p=request_form_-_inquiring_org_-_preliminary

Data Discovery:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Data+Discovery+-+Employee+Permission+Request+Form+-+Inquiring+Club
custom_expected:
THEN the current values will be stored and the Request will reload in view mode
AND After a successful save the system will display a successful save blue notification
BUT If the Request was a new request that had not been save previously, it will be given a status of Preliminary

title: As a Club User, I want to Designate an Employee Negotiator
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in as Club User

Wire:
https://82lvmf.axshare.com/#p=authorized_signatory_negotiator
https://82lvmf.axshare.com/#p=edit_an_authorized_signatory_negotiator
custom_steps: WHEN on the Signatories & Negotiators widget
custom_expected:
THEN there will be a new "Emp Negot"
AND the column will be located after the "Negot" column
AND this column will be editable and changes made to it will be saved when the widget is saved

title: As an Inquiring Club User, I want to Edit a Preliminary Employee Permission Req. Form
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as a CLUB
AND that Club has made a Preliminary Employee Permission Req

Wire:
https://hri2kq.axshare.com/#p=request_form_-_inquiring_org_-_preliminary

Data Discovery:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Data+Discovery+-+Employee+Permission+Request+Form+-+Inquiring+Club
custom_steps: WHEN opening the Preliminary Permission Request
custom_expected:
THEN an Edit button will be available anytime the form is in view mode if the form is in Preliminary State and the viewing user has edit permissions
AND clicking Edit will reload the form in edit mode 
AND in Edit mode 2 button will be available,    Save  |  Cancel

title: As a BOC User, I want supporting documents to be available on all Employee Permission Requests
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as BOC

Wire:
https://hri2kq.axshare.com/#p=request_form_-_inquiring_org_-_preliminary
custom_steps: WHEN viewing an Employee Permission Request
custom_expected:
THEN there will be a footer section titled "Employee Permissions Process Information" as depicted in the wire
AND there will be two PDF documents available for users to open / download
 -- Tampering Policy
 -- Interview Process for Key Baseball Positions

title: Employee Permission Requests: PERMISSIONS Part II
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is logged in as a CLUB
custom_steps:
WHEN a user has one of the following roles

 - ebis-empc-club-executive-admin-role
 - ebis-empc-club-field-personnel-admin-role
 - ebis-empc-club-front-office-admin-role
 - ebis-empc-club-scouting-admin-role
custom_expected:
THEN Club Users with any UEC Admin permissions should have access to the widget
AND all four roles should have the ebis-widget-clubeepermissionreq Permission

title: As an Inquiring Club User, I want to submit an Employee Permission Request to Another Club
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as a CLUB

Wire:
https://hri2kq.axshare.com/#p=request_form_-_inquiring_org_-_preliminary
https://82lvmf.axshare.com/#p=authorized_signatory_negotiator

https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Data+Discovery+-+Employee+Permission+Request+Form+-+Receiving+Club
custom_steps: WHEN viewing a New or Preliminary Employee Permission Requests
custom_expected:
THEN there will be a Submit button on new and Preliminary Employee Permission Requests
AND clicking Submit will perform a required field check
AND if the required field check passes, the Request's status will update to Pending
AND the Request will now appear on the Employee Permission Request widget for the user chosen as the Current Org Contact
AND the Request will also appear on the widget for any user from the Current Org that has the "Emp Negot" column checked for them on the Signatories & Negotiators widget
AND the system will generate a clipboard notification for the Current Org Contact notifying them that a new Employee Permission Request has been submitted

title: As a Receiving Club User, I want to view a Pending Employee Permission Request that has been sent to me
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as a CLUB
AND viewing the Employee Permission Request widget

Wires:
https://hri2kq.axshare.com/#p=permission_requests_-_club
https://hri2kq.axshare.com/#p=request_form_-_receiving_org_-_pending

Data Discovery:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Data+Discovery+-+Employee+Permission+Request+Form+-+Receiving+Club
custom_steps: WHEN clicking the status of a Pending Request from another Org
custom_expected:
THEN the form will open the Request in Edit mode
AND the form will match the provide wire and data discovery
AND the Receiving Club will be able to edit Employee Type and Current Club Contacts
AND there will be an "Add Contact" link and when clicked, a new Club Contact dropdown will be added
AND clicking the trash can will remove the contact
AND there will be a new [Club] Comments box for the Receiving club to add comments to the request
AND there will be a Save button and Cancel Button

title: Add June 30th Option to As Of Date Prompt on Payroll Comp Report
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is on the reports widget
AND selected the Payroll Comp Report
custom_expected: THEN June 30th will be an option on the report

title: As a Developer, I want Anthony's queries turned into reports he can access himself
As an AMT User, I want to receive emails if a Checked In player becomes Approaching
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in as an AMT User 

Rules:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Prospect+Statuses
custom_steps: WHEN a checked In player becomes approaching because he is nearing his checked in day limit
custom_expected:
THEN the system will send an email to users of the Club where he is checked in AND BOC Users
AND these emails will be generated every day until he is checked out

- Text of email:
**Subject:** Player Approaching!
**Content:** Prospect [Last, First] is currently checked in and approaching the permissible length of stay at a Club facility. Please log into AMT to review.

title: As an AMT User, I want to receive emails if a Checked In player becomes Overdue
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in as an AMT User

Rules:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Prospect+Statuses
custom_steps: WHEN if a Checked In player becomes Overdue because he has reached his checked in day limit
custom_expected:
THEN the system will send an email to users of the Club where he is checked in AND BOC Users
AND these emails will be generated every day until he is checked out

 - Text of email:
**Subject:** Player Overdue!
**Content:** Prospect [Last, First] is currently checked in and has exceeded the permissible length of stay at a Club facility. Please log into AMT to review.

title: As a Club User, I want to receive an email when the status of one of my Club's Travel Authorization Forms is Updated
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as a CLUB

Related to:
https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/161764860
https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/161764887
custom_steps: WHEN a submitted Travel Authorization Form has its status updated to Approved or Rejected, the system will send an email to users of the Club that submitted the Form
custom_expected:
THEN the system will send an email to users of the Club that submitted the Form

 - Text of email:
**Subject:** Travel Form Update
**Content:** There has been an update to the travel form submitted on [date submitted] for prospect [Last, First]. Please log into AMT to review.
